text:
At first glance, this seems ordinary.  

However, the ideas from this meeting are unique.  

The CEO has removed the mental cost of planning.  

People no longer worry about attendance.  

This allows them to focus on creative problem solving.  

His team generates inventive ideas and solutions easily.  

They make it look natural and effortless.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Regular meetings led by the CEO enhance creative problem-solving by removing mental costs associated with planning and attendance.
